= Manual Odoo Options

This config section convert environment variable related to manual odoo options to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/other_option.adoc[]




== Other environment keys



[[env_OPT_ODOO]]
=== OPT_ODOO
Allow to set non official config without dedicated converter

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `OPT_ODOO` is used and expect a `Dict`.

NOTE: No cli argument exist for this key
